Tonight on @NewsHour, George Floyd's brother, Philonise Floyd, told me he thinks about Darnella Frazier who filmed the murder of his brother often. 

"I know that my brother would just be another dead person if it weren't for her," he said. https://t.co/jnbiUlQUt1

data.text: @Yamiche @NewsHour Darnella Frazier was quoted saying, “The world needed to see what I was seeing.”  Thanks to her, we did.  She had resolve, a strong moral core, and quiet nerves of steel.  I wish her abiding peace.
